lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: IT MAKES ME FEEL AWESOME.  I love having a way of helping other hardworking people all around the world.  It is a very small amount in my world - but makes a world of difference to other people.  I give as much as I can!

The Peace Corps' mission has three simple goals:

2) Helping promote a better understanding of Americans on the part of the peoples served. 
3) Helping promote a better understanding of other peoples on the part of Americans.

lenders.loan_because: I loan because of the Robin's theory: Everything you give comes back to you seven times, even if it's not money!

lenders.name: Julie and Jon
lenders.loan_because: I would want someone else to give me the same opportunity.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: because I believe in the act of sharing and I want to impact the world is a positive way and this is one small step

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: It is great to be able to make a big difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I don't want to give people handouts. I'm confident that this website is reliable and I want to help people succeed in improving their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a television station that is funded by viewers!

lenders.name: Cipeo
lenders.loan_because: I fee that the world can't change without someone taking a step, and this is my step.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies who send and receive products through my companies railroad, with questions and problems. Also I work in a elementary school after school is over to help students with school work, fitness, meals, and positive support for issues in their lives that they might not get at home.

lenders.name: The Berger Family
lenders.loan_because: Great way to feel connected to helping create a positive change in our world.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife is an attorney and I work in sales for a Coffee company based in Pennsauken, NJ.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I process paperwork that help people qualify to buy a home.

lenders.name: Haroo Family
lenders.loan_because: because we can and because we care
lenders.occupational_info: we are a small group of friends, in high school, trying to make a difference in impoverished regions of the world.

lenders.name: Robin & Archie
lenders.loan_because: Because we feel it is the right thing to do.  Everyone needs hope, needs to know someone is out there who cares.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is important to share some of the wonderful gifts that God has given me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother, wife and grandmother.  I am retired but active in my church and community

lenders.name: Dom
lenders.loan_because: I admire true entrepreneurial spirit, wherever it comes from.
lenders.occupational_info: I've been in the media business for sixteen years and have worked on a variety of magazines and websites in the UK, US and throughout Europe. I'm now working on a startup web development business in the green space.

lenders.name: shawn
lenders.loan_because: I love helping those in need
lenders.occupational_info: Manage design & construction of large building projects

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: My uncle gave me a gift certificate and it makes me feel good to help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school.  I play hockey and the sax.  I like to read.

lenders.name: HARRY
lenders.loan_because: Giving back make me feel good
lenders.occupational_info: I teach because I love educating folks about what they don't know

lenders.name: Justin and Michelle
lenders.loan_because:
Jesus
~it is a smart way to help the poor~
lenders.occupational_info:
Justin manages water resources
Michelle helps spread the gospel of Christ

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs little help getting where they're going.
lenders.occupational_info: Doctor

lenders.name: Alexis
lenders.loan_because: I loan becasue I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Significant

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: I have the money and don't use it.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who are having trouble with computers.  Some tools are extensions of your hand, for example the hammer, the cup,  and the plow.  Other tools are extensions of your mind, computers.  I fix when them when they are not working as they should be.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to, and I'm glad that I can.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: I want to contribute to make the world a better and more peacable place for all people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in middle school. I study math, language, science, social studies, music, health, and art.

lenders.name: Libby and Katherine
lenders.loan_because: Our parents want us to know how good it feels to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: We go to school, go to dance class, and play with our friends.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I know that every person has the ability to make a difference in someone else's life and if I don't help who will?  I am a member of Soroptimist International whose focus is on helping women and girls, and Kiva gives me the chance to help other women who really want to make a difference in their own life and in the lives of their families as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I cash paychecks, make deposits into accounts, and count money.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: That is what Christ calls all people to do. Help others in need and to give all you have.
lenders.occupational_info: I get my clients media coverage. My job is to ensure their company gets noticed and to increase their profits.

lenders.name: Shelby & Zack
lenders.loan_because: In our past we were each involved in international development work (Shelby in India; Zack in Armenia).  Even though we are settled down in the U.S., it's fun to continue in a small way to lend opportunities to others.
lenders.occupational_info: Shelby does research to analyze local community issues and evaluate programs so that people in the community can make good decisions about what issues to focus on and what to do about them.  Zack is a poet and translator, and also works and studies in the health field.

lenders.name: Doug and Jenn
lenders.loan_because: it is great to help people across the world.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Terence
lenders.loan_because: Although I don't make much money, I know I should be putting it to better use than eating out everyday and buying useless things.
lenders.occupational_info: I play music, and a lot of hard work goes into it without any guarantee of monetary reward. I wouldn't say fame or fortune are my sole intentions for being a musician, but I understand the dream of being successful at whatever it is you want to pursue, and to reap the benefits whether they be creative, spiritual, or financial.

lenders.name: Liam
lenders.loan_because: I want to do something proactive to help people who face economic disadvantages, and the Kiva philosphy of helping those who are trying to help themselves really appeals to me.
lenders.occupational_info: History and Archaeology student.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I believe these people are asking for a "HAND UP" not a handout and I am fortunate enough to be able to help, even if it's not much.   : )

lenders.name: Bobbi
lenders.loan_because:
It's the right thing to do, we have so much.
Traveling around the world has shown me how wonderful other cultures are & I want to do something in my life that will matter. Reaching out with assistance to others matters, & that changes things. 
BE THE CHANGE!

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: helping people become self-sufficient is the great equalizer

lenders.name: Dave the Wave
lenders.loan_because: others have loaned to me
lenders.occupational_info: i care about urban sustainability and creativity

lenders.name: Cassie
lenders.loan_because: I have the capabilities to help others, and I see no good reason why I shouldn't.

lenders.name: Koelfgen Family
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we believe that everyone should have the opportunity to live a successful and fulfilling life.
lenders.occupational_info: Creating Advertisements, Protecting National Park Land, Selling and Buying Land and Houses, Taking Naps

lenders.name: Leandra
lenders.loan_because: I want to "Pay it Forward." We live in a great country and are very lucky to have the opportunities we have.  Not everyone in life is so lucky. I hope this will give them a chance for a better life and they will, in turn, continue to "Pay it Forward" for someone else in need.

lenders.name: Len
lenders.loan_because: I want to help improve lives in the Middle East.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.occupational_info: marketing and communication

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I have seen poverty in third world countries and it breaks my heart.  It takes so little to make an impact and change someone's life for the better.  I want to be part of the solution.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people buying or selling their homes.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: it's the most effective way to change the world $25 @ a time
lenders.occupational_info: If it was easy, more people would be doing it.

lenders.name: Reshma
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate and believe I should contribute to the global community
lenders.occupational_info: I provide information technology service and support to the U.S. government

lenders.name: Molly and Carly
lenders.loan_because: it is important to support other entrepreneurs in the world who are less fortunate than we are.  we are so lucky here, we should give what we can.
lenders.occupational_info: we are students, but we also founded and run a non-profit business of our own dedicated to finding a cure for cancer.  Our company raises bees and sells their honey and honey related products.  All of our profits go to curing cancer.  We know that what it takes to start and sustain a business is sometimes money added to energy and will!

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I make medical equipment.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I feel good helping others enrich their own lives.  Kiva has made it so easy to turn a small amount of money into great opportunity across the world!

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: Because we are all connected.
lenders.occupational_info: I work one to one with children and youth in foster care.

lenders.name: Juan Martitegui
lenders.loan_because: I want help people to help themselves

lenders.name: Harriet
lenders.loan_because: We are all part of one another; I help someone, someone else helps me.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find ways out of domestic violence to lives of safety and peace.

lenders.name: Julio Cesar
lenders.occupational_info:
Working with the sale of computers with basic configuration with the payment deadline extended to people of low income in my city.
I fragmentation of the payment in 24 months.
Part of the profit from sales is placed in a non-governmental organisation which provides computer classes for the poor in my city.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help provide an opportunity for those who live in areas of the world where opportunities are limited.
lenders.occupational_info: I implement programs within a private company (manufactures chemicals to clean drinking water) to make sure they are compliant with goverment regulations.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women around the world become successful entreprenuers to build their families and communities.  I would like to help them have the same opportunities for success that I have had.
lenders.occupational_info: In 2006, I opened an online store focusing on artistic needle arts supplies for quilting, knitting, needlepoint and cross stitch.  Before that I created my own quilts to sell at art fairs and to local shops.

lenders.name: Josh Nankivel
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurship is the engine that drives economic prosperity.  Capital is part of the fuel mixture that allows that engine to run.  I want to see our global community prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to teach people how to get started in project management as a career and improve their skills!

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: I think the world is out of whack, and if I can do something to change that, I should.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently in school.

lenders.name: Germanican
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone who has the will power and ambition but lacks the funds to improve their living standard.  It's such a small effort to lend a KIVA loan yet so many lives will be positively impacted by assisting these hard working, brave people.  If everyone would just sponsor one person in a less fortunate country, the world would be a much better place!

lenders.name: ivonne
lenders.loan_because: i want/can do it

lenders.name: MaryAnn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women succeed particularly when those women are on their own and responsible for children and other family members.
lenders.occupational_info: My work used to be caring for children who were having surgery; now I am retired and helping with the care of my grandaughter.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I feel we are globally connected as human beings.  Everyone deserves a good living and a safe place to live.  I can help in this way.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer at the local zoo as a zoo ambassador, promoting conservation and love of animals to zoo guests.  I also volunteer at the Ronald McDonald House which houses families and critically ill children.

lenders.name: Dj Das
lenders.occupation: Big Data Consulting Services / Strategy & Marketing / Big Data Evangelist
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of "little drops of water that make an ocean".
lenders.occupational_info: Building new businesses, creating livelihoods, making a difference.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: Every raindrop raises the sea.

lenders.name: Joy
lenders.loan_because: When I needed help, someone helped me.

lenders.name: Tarak & Beena + Anjali
lenders.loan_because: I believe that money should be spent where it's best utilized.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a medical student, my wife is a pharmacist.

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an amazing way of helping other people.

lenders.name: Chris and Sally
lenders.loan_because: We did not earn the opportunity to turn our hard work into full and prosperous lives. This good fortune was given to us.  We want to share some of our good fortune with others who have not been so lucky in where and when they were born.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: everybody can use a hand up every now and then!
lenders.occupational_info: I work at an insurance company, using a computer to analyze trends in our business.  One of my favorite volunteer activities is helping build houses with Habitat for Humanity - another "hand up" organization!

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It's the only system like this in the world and it really works.  This is how we should all be donating money.  To help others help themselves!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Actor in Films and Television shows, as well as I do voice-work in Animated series and commercials.

lenders.name: Betsey
lenders.loan_because: It started as a gift for Christmas from a dear friend, and now it is the base for my resolution to be more involved with charity and giving.  I think Kiva allows people to truly engage in helping others while seeing the positive results of their actions.  Being able to help others through a relatively small sum of money is a powerful feeling and one I hope to keep going for others.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I help people find housing and work as an administrator in a small minority owned real estate company.

lenders.name: Jolynn
lenders.loan_because: There's no reason not to. Especially when as little as $25 can make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying for my PhD in English: Creative Writing.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: I live in such a prosperous country, and I believe in sharing that prosperity with others.  Kiva gives us a wonderful opportunity to share a tiny bit in a very big way.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: I want to Help people and learn about small businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student

lenders.name: Betty
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to support a person's effort to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired Nurse Midwife who has been very involved in promoting women's health and wellness for most of my life. The fun part was to help women deliver their babies.

lenders.name: Solvei
lenders.occupational_info: I help kids stay healthy in school.

lenders.name: christopher
lenders.loan_because: It's cool.
lenders.occupational_info: Grounding people financially.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.occupational_info: I develop internet web sites.

lenders.name: Lilly
lenders.loan_because:
Feeling and expressing compassion is just not enough. I believe in helping people help themselves. We all need a little help now and then and for very few dollars I can help make a big difference in someones life. It's time to close the door of hate and open the door of love all over the world.

"The intuitive mind is a sacred gift and the rational mind is a faithful servant. We have created a society that honors the servant and has forgotten the gift." - Albert Einstein

I am here to honor my Gift, and to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a personal growth expert, MS, MA, P.h.D., a relationship, marriage and family therapist, motivational and inspirational speaker, intuitive clairvoyant  counselor, and author. I help people from all walks of life develop strategies to attract, grow, and retain meaningful and long lasting relationships.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I love to see people helpping themself and not looking to others for support

lenders.name: Kathy & Barry
lenders.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate for Christmas from my parents.  I am looking forward to using this gift.  This program sounds like a wonderful opportunity for everyone involved.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a school district.  I assist the Superintendent with day to day operations.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: Want to give deserving people and enterprises my support

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to live in a wonderful country like Canada, and I want to share to make someone else's life easier.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with people who have substance abuse problems

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because: It's a good way to help people in a direct way, even if there is a great distance between where you live.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the Australian Government, and would describe my work to someone across the world as, better than it once was.
